name.zh: 迷你斜挎收纳包（多颜色）

description.en: A compact crossbody utility bag for daily essentials and travel. Features a structured main compartment, secure zipper closure, and adjustable shoulder strap. Great for phone, passport, small wallet, and quick-access items. OEM/ODM customization available for fabrics (including recycled options), size, pocket layout, logo patch, lining, zippers (YKK optional) & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 迷你斜挎收纳包，适合日常与旅行随身携带。主仓立体结构更好收纳，拉链闭合安全可靠，肩带可调。适合放手机、护照、小钱包等随身物品。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、尺寸、口袋结构、Logo 工艺、内里、拉链（可选 YKK）与五金、包装等。

en: Outer: Nylon / Polyester (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：尼龙/涤纶（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
肩带：可调节织带肩带（可定制）
五金：D 环/调节扣/插扣等（可定制）

en.Organization: Main compartment + inner pocket (optional) + front pocket (optional)
en.Use Case: Phone & passport carry, travel essentials, city walk
en.Customization: Fabric, color, size, logo, lining, pockets, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 高 14–18cm × 宽 10–14cm × 深 4–7cm（可定制）
zh.收纳结构: 主仓 + 内袋（可选）+ 前袋（可选）
zh.适用场景: 手机护照随身包、旅行收纳、城市漫步
zh.颜色款式: 多 SKU 配色（见 variants）
zh.可定制: 面料配色、尺寸、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
